claims.claim: AI-powered diagnostic systems can detect certain cancers with accuracy comparable to experienced radiologists.
claims.evidence: AI-powered diagnostic systems can detect certain cancers with accuracy comparable to experienced radiologists.

claims.claim: Machine learning models trained on large medical datasets are capable of identifying patterns that are often missed by human clinicians.
claims.evidence: Machine learning models trained on large medical datasets are capable of identifying patterns that are often missed by human clinicians.

claims.claim: AI systems are being used to optimize staff scheduling, reduce patient wait times, and predict hospital readmissions.
claims.evidence: AI systems are being used to optimize staff scheduling, reduce patient wait times, and predict hospital readmissions.
